amendment.description: An amendment numbered 48 printed in Part A of House Report 118-216 to provide $15 million in funding for the DoD wide Psychedelic Medical Clinical Trials.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Luttrell amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Luttrell amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Luttrell amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
